Reviews.Title: Good for unlimited talk and text. Web access so awkward it is useless
Reviews.Author: Say Play "SayPlay"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Verizon phone because of the prepaid plan for 50$ a month for unlimited talk, text and web. That seemed to be a great deal. Also the prepaid plan has no contract to keep you bound to this service.Unfortunately, the web access is almost useless, as the technology to  get there and move around is very awkward. Access is extremely slow and filled with landmines that blow up unexpectedly and you land somewhere  Verizon tries to sell you ring tones etc. (This happens repeatedly) Meanwhile, back at the web, you haven't gotten anywhere and are still waiting for a connection with your fingers crosses that you won't be side tracked again.I attempted to go to my Gmail account and found that I could get onto a Google search page, but not sign into my Gmail. If email is important enough to you, there is an option for Verizon "Mobil email" which I assume make it easier to send and receive email, but the charge for it is about 7$ a month.From my point of view, if you talk and text to the point that 50$ will save you money, it is a great deal. The web access is all but useless.The sound of the phone is good and clear with un-muffled sound. Conversation is easy to hear and understand.The keys on the phone are smaller than what I have been used to, but think that most women would find them workable. I frequently find that I am using the tip of my thumb nail to hit the keys, as opposed to my finger tips. If you are a man with even a medium size hand, I recommend that you handle the phone before purchase to see if it will work for you.I found this Pantech phone at Best Buy in October 2011 for under 60.00$. Verizon charges 35$ to get it up and running and is capable of allowing the use of a different existing number that is yours, like a home phone number you are ready to terminate.

Reviews.Title: amazon is the cheapest for this phone
Reviews.Author: Nancy Marie Cohen
Reviews.Content: it looks exactly like a blackberry, the camera could be better (but works good), there is a lock on the keys (so you don't have to worry about accidentally calling people), there is enough room for your fingers to text. the screen is not too small, i didn't try the internet. overall, i don't have anything to complain about.

Reviews.Title: Primary Message phone
Reviews.Author: Gary Knotts
Reviews.Content: The phone does what its designed to do well, If people want a smart phone they should buy one and stop compareing feature phones like this to iPhone and the like.There or worse phones out there.

Reviews.Title: Great phone to get me through.
Reviews.Author: W. Burkholder
Reviews.Content: I broke my S3 and needed something to use until it's S5 time, this has been ideal for just a basic phone.

Reviews.Title: Not So Smart Phones Rule
Reviews.Author: Melissa Morgan-Oakes
Reviews.Content: Exceptional value, and a decent phone to boot. Prepaid means cheaper cell service. All we really want is talk and text, and this phone gives us that. We have three in the family now, and love them all to bits n pieces - and we REALLY love not paying a huge bill for services we weren't using!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Y. Mabry "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone but I have had 2 cellphones for probably the last 10 years. I switched to a prepaid plan on my 2nd line last year. I just purchased this phone and love it. I like the keyboard although it is a bit small and I have small hands. But for a very inexpensive phone, it's a phenomenal buy!

Reviews.Title: Great price for a great phone.
Reviews.Author: Ideally Unique
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for a couple of weeks now. I love it. It does exactly what I want it to do. Shipping was a breeze and the price was beyond reasonable. I would definitely order from this vendor again, and the phone, itself, was exactly what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: I dont know why people are making a fuss about this phone being so horrible, because I think it's great for the price. Maybe it's because everyone is so spoiled on these high-tech phones, that they expect alot out of every phone out there. I think it's perfect and the internet works great. I'd recommend this phone to anyone. Love it.

Reviews.Title: The best phone!
Reviews.Author: Glenda
Reviews.Content: Before i bought this phone, i had another that i was using just like it. It lasted over 4 years. The longest any phone has lasted me of all the prepaid phones i've ever owned. So,if u live on a buget an u can only afford a 50 dollar a month unlimited plan every month, this is the phone i would go with. It's also pay as u go as well.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Kristen davey
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  I went from an android smart phone to a prepaid "dumb phone" and I am liking the phone for what I use it for- texting and talking (mostly texting).  I like how small it is and thin also.  It easily fits in my pocket and because I have small hands the keys are fine for me.  I can see how it might be frustrating for someone with larger fingers.

Reviews.Title: Very Content with this phone .. Well i was at first Now im NOT!
Reviews.Author: Bree
Reviews.Content: I recieved this phone today , purchased it off ebay .. i WAS Very skeptical about getting a phone offline , especially ebay . there are a Bunch of scandals with any site tday when it comes to electronics but i talked to my seller and he took some hesitation away from me as i asked if it was or wasnt a refurbished phone , etc.I had the pantech jest phone txt8040 phone since dec. of 2009 or 2010 i cant remem. its been a while so wanted to upgrade .. A con with this phone is that is does not have an MP3 Player! and it has less choices of things than i had with the pantech jest .. i Love the keyboard and the pinkish-red color of some of the keyboard keys .. and i Love how small my phone is. When i recieved my pantech jest phone it was tiny and cute but this phone is Way Slimer and just the right size for me ..If you mainly Text and just Text then this is the phone for you .. i dont do anything else But text so i have the 20$ messaging bundle .. i dont talk on the phone or use the web so basically i got this phone just to upgrade .. in a texting manner.. my pantech jest was giving out on me with the battery and etc.. i wished this phone had a mp3 player but i can use my jest phone when i wanna hear music so thats not that big of an issue for me ..You cant do much with this phone & its really not a phone i would pay 50 $ a month for! The features suck lol so like i said thats why i only got this phone to text.. um the screen is way smaller than the jest phone and thats another dislike for me .. the picture taking looks very annoying so i think ill continue to take pics with my jest phone and transfer them to the PC with my SD card and then send the pics to my caper phone by email .The pictures i already sent to my caper phone looks very weird in my phone being that its soo small .. But other then what i said this is a perfect phone for a preteen .. since i know teens my age do more then text. im 17 , almost 18 but this phone works for me because the other stuff isnt really important to me , im use to just texting anyway.The Camera on this phone SUCKS .. if you take a full photo the phone is in your face and you have to back up if you dont want the phone in you face.. with my case the phone looks Hideous lol and its just very wierd looking!  / its complicated ..& its Not a smartphone! its a basic phone!**This phone comes with 10$ Airtime .. But if you transfer you original verizon number to the caper , you Will Not get the 10$ airtime** You'll have the same balance that you had before the number transfer.I'm just updating my review .. had this phone for two days now and um i dont like it at all . . at first i loved it but now that i founded out that the camera sucks i just really dislike the phone now ! It already is a downgrade from the jest i at least thought i could take nice pics with it but i cant . .

Reviews.Title: Have someone set it up
Reviews.Author: Art2Photography
Reviews.Content: I bought this cell phone, only problem I had right at first was setting it right ! I went to a local Verizon store, where they help me set it properly, they did it for me free, took maybe 10 minutes, all they had to do, was do a data transfer from my old flip phone to newer Pantech Caper cell phone.What this did was transfer all of my old phones data, contacts & photo's. I thought at first I had lost all of that stuff, only thing we did was after the Verizon associate did something, we had to keep the phone close to each other, this new Pantech Caper cell phone has Blue tooth same as my old flip phone so they could talk to each other and transfer everything.Boy was I happy, I had a ton of phone numbers and emails, house address with cell / house phone numbers and everything you would ever think to have in the way of contacts on my flip phone, now I have on my Caper, plus I have all of my photo's too :o)I'm very happy with this newer cell phone, so far a lot easier to operate now than other cell phone, plus key pad a lot easier to text and type in info. The cell camera is adequate for the screen size, its not a fancy expensive cell phone, but for the money it is a pretty amazing pre paid cell phone. I would recommend anyone who wants a prepaid cell phone, not smart phone, but prepaid account like I have to buy this cell phone, I would buy another one in a heart beat, no second quessing that one :o)  if it had a data card it would be perfect just about :o)I have a lot of friends who own, fancier cell phones with expensive cell phone plans, I use my cell more for a phone than play games or texting and surfing the internet, I have a tablet for surfing the internet I have with me if I want to do that kind of thing, lot bigger screen and easier to see and do things.So this phone is just what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE PHONE!
Reviews.Author: gladys trimble
Reviews.Content: FOR JUST A BASIC PHONE IT IS A GREAT FIND. I LOVE IT . I DO NOT DO THE INTERNET ON MY PHONE SO IT WAS A GOOD FIND.

Reviews.Title: Its satisfactory at best. The camera isnt all that great either
Reviews.Author: Destinys Chyld
Reviews.Content: Eh... Not much to say about this phone, I wouldnt buy it again though. Its satisfactory at best. The camera isnt all that great either. Its good for calls and texting. One thing i HATE about this phone is it randomly connects to the internet. heh...

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: the phone is small,nice wat i expected...it could only be used as pre payed...i was looking for something that u could change from pre paid to contract...other then that phone was nice...

Reviews.Title: Pantec caper
Reviews.Author: Arthur K.
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product  easy to use. I like the key pad big enough to read the numbers and letters. I also like the fact the screen is big enough to see  and the key board locks so no accidental phone calls.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Mime
Reviews.Content: Great phone comes brand new in box. Works perfect. Just what I wanted for a pre paid phone. Can't go wrong buy it.

Reviews.Title: I'm glad I bought it
Reviews.Author: GGG "GGS"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and it works great.  I likes it because the keyboard is located on the phone itself.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Hilpert
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone for someone that just needs a simple phone, but a good phone that they can still text and talk on.

Reviews.Title: Great basic phone for prior smartphone users
Reviews.Author: Chandra Freeman
Reviews.Content: This is perfect phone when switching from a smartphone back to a basic.  It still takes some getting used to but definitely doesn't make you feel like you went back to the dark ages!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Patricia Harvey "Patsroamin"
Reviews.Content: I bought the first Pantech to update to a qwerty keyboard.  I rarely use it for calls or internet.  I love it for what I wanted.  BUT---after a few months the keys stopped working making texting impossible.  I didn't realize it had a 1-yr warranty, and I purchased a 2nd one.  It worked great for about 3 months, and I started having keys sticking AGAIN!  I've had it with this phone now, even though I could get it warranteed, and I'm looking for a new phone--Not a Pantech!

Reviews.Title: Not my favorite but does what I need
Reviews.Author: Leslie Kernehan
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone as it was in the price range I was looking for. Buttons are very small and hard to push just one at a time. And it occasionally will reboot itself, sometimes not at the most convenient time.

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: rayne_jessi
Reviews.Content: This phone is perfect for texting. THAT'S IT!Everything else is very slow and/or low quality.Although, the sound quality is pretty good.When it comes down to it, this is a good back-up phone.

Reviews.Title: update on my previous review
Reviews.Author: pcolburn
Reviews.Content: The phone started shutting off and realized that the battery that came with it was too small for the phone, we have had to put a rolled up piece of duct tape on it to keep it in place, so it doesnt keep shutting off. but other then that, the phone is great, and I would definately recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Okay phone but annoying.
Reviews.Author: andermac
Reviews.Content: Nice thin shape fits pocket well but unless you lock keypad everytime you put it there it tries to go online or dial. Too sensitive. Buttons are too small for most stylus so long thumbnails a must to dial or text.

Reviews.Title: love it so much
Reviews.Author: keke
Reviews.Content: i really needed a phone because mine was going bananas so i ordered it from advisory and jst received it yesterday. so far i have had no problems out of it at all they keyboard is great, the screen works perfectly i just love it so much. if u need a low cost phone that works really well then this is the phone for you.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: redmax
Reviews.Content: i just got this phone today at walmart the internet is a joke, and i have to reset it constantly just to be able to make a call. i love the keyboard but thats about it. and verizon is not being helpful at all i have called them 6 times already.  i bought 2 of these phones and they are both doing it.

Reviews.Title: ok phone
Reviews.Author: dominique
Reviews.Content: I ordered it for a friend and they liked it so i guess it was a good gift and cheap

Reviews.Title: good little phone
Reviews.Author: kellie
Reviews.Content: I ordered a used one for my mother she needed just a simple phone, and it came brand new in the box WOW!and it works well and has all she needs

Reviews.Title: I don't like this phone...
Reviews.Author: Kyra
Reviews.Content: So I found this and bought it online at Verizon Wireless. It looked really cute and reminded me of a blackberry cell I used to have! I imagined it to be an awesome phone. WRONG!I love the way it looks. But it is a thin plastic, cheaply made. Which isn't a big deal, but isn't very durable.What I hate the most is the way it works and the screens display and options...First of all, there doesn't seem to be a camera button. You have to go to your pictures, click options, then click take a picture just to get to the camera...which doesn't have a good quality at all, and right after you take a picture and hear the shutter, it doesn't even take the picture until a few seconds after the shutter... And which my last 2 pictures I took, I went back to look at them and they didn't even save!!!The phone also randomly dropped my call when I had full service, in the middle of talking to a Verizon Representative to help me with this thing. Ironic!If you don't have the unlimited plan, you'll eat up your minutes fast. Way too easy to accidently hit the browser button, which logs you onto the internet and takes forever to load, if at all, but you know what? As soon as you hit that button, even if it doesn't LOAD you onto a webpage, it immediately starts counting that towards your minutes!Everything on the screen is crammed and so oddly arranged and the options are just plain weird and make no sense... I HATE this phone, gonna look into getting a refund before it's too late.

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: Fashionista
Reviews.Content: works for me, what I needed. thanks, thanks, thanks, ty, ty, ty, ty, ty. ty, ty, ty, ty, ty, ty,

Reviews.Title: Stolen phone
Reviews.Author: Bryce
Reviews.Content: It Was stolen so I couldn't use the phone at all and had to throw the phone away or I would of went to jail. BAD SELLER!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Pantech, Casper cellphone
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: this is a wonderful phone, wish i had got it long time ago. easy to use, compact... it's great !!

Reviews.Title: Cute Cell
Reviews.Author: adp "amber"
Reviews.Content: The screen is a good size and it has some great options for organization I don't know about how well it works though I have to send it back because it didn't work with my plan.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.2-inch TFT LCD display; Candy Bar form factor with Full QWERTY Keyboard
1.3 Megapixel Camera
Text, Picture and Voice Messaging
My Verizon
Account Balance Display
Candy Bar form factor with Full QWERTY Keyboard
What's in the Box: handset, rechargeable battery, charger, battery cover, quick start guide
ProductInfo.Name: Pantech Caper Prepaid Phone (Verizon Wireless)
